SEARCH
Package org.apache.commons.lang3.function

Interface FailableLongToDoubleFunction<E extends Throwable>

Type Parameters:
E - The kind of thrown exception or error.
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface FailableLongToDoubleFunction<E extends Throwable>
A functional interface like LongToDoubleFunction that declares a Throwable.
Since:
3.11
